abstract: weekly research analysts ' ratings changes for california resources .
article: california resources has recently received a number of price target changes and ratings updates : 1/18/2018 -- california resources was upgraded by analysts at zacks investment research from a `` sell '' rating to a `` hold '' rating . they now have a $ 26.00 price target on the stock . according to zacks , `` california resources corporation is engaged in exploration and production of oil and gas . the company produces , gathers , processes and markets crude oil , natural gas , natural gas liquids and electricity primarily in the state of california . california resources corporation is based in los angeles , california .

`` 1/16/2018 -- california resources was upgraded by analysts at bank of america corp from a `` neutral '' rating to a `` buy '' rating . 1/9/2018 -- california resources was downgraded by analysts at zacks investment research from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating . according to zacks , `` california resources corporation is engaged in exploration and production of oil and gas . the company produces , gathers , processes and markets crude oil , natural gas , natural gas liquids and electricity primarily in the state of california . california resources corporation is based in los angeles , california .

`` 1/4/2018 -- california resources was downgraded by analysts at societe generale from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating . 1/4/2018 -- california resources was upgraded by analysts at bank of america corp from an `` underperform '' rating to a `` neutral '' rating . they now have a $ 24.00 price target on the stock . 12/18/2017 -- california resources was downgraded by analysts at zacks investment research from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating . according to zacks , `` california resources corporation is engaged in exploration and production of oil and gas .

the company produces , gathers , processes and markets crude oil , natural gas , natural gas liquids and electricity primarily in the state of california . california resources corporation is based in los angeles , california . `` shares of california resources corp opened at $ 23.67 on wednesday . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 991.11 , a price-to-earnings ratio of -4.88 and a beta of 6.53 . california resources corp has a 1-year low of $ 6.47 and a 1-year high of $ 23.92 . the company has a quick ratio of 0.53 , a current ratio of 0.61 and a debt-to-equity ratio of -8.78 .

california resources last posted its quarterly earnings data on monday , november 6th . the oil and gas producer reported earnings per share for the quarter , beating the zacks ' consensus estimate of by $ 0.39 . the company had revenue of $ 455.00 million during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 476.87 million . the business 's revenue for the quarter was down . 2 % on a year-over-year basis . during the same quarter in the previous year , the company earned earnings per share . equities analysts anticipate that california resources corp will post -4.68 eps for the current fiscal year .

california resources corporation is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company , with operating properties within the state of california . the company produced approximately 140 thousand barrels of oil equivalent per day , as of december 31 , 2016 . as of december 31 , 2016 , the company had net proved reserves of 568 million barrels of oil equivalent . receive news & ratings for california resources corp daily - enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts ' ratings for california resources corp and related companies with marketbeat .
